phrase.text: Halt! Do not waste time chasing these weaklings; this is their territory and they might set up an ambush. We must plan well if we are to conquer Rome.
Yes, great Hannibal! It appears that a Roman settlement up north is willing to aid us against Rome. Maybe you should go there.
Besides, to the west, there is the port of Ostia. From there, the Romans receive reinforcements for their army. Should we capture it, we could bring more troops from Carthage.
